PAL.NAME: Microsoft Lync Server 2010 - Monitoring/Archiving
PAL.DESCRIPTION: Performance counter thresholds for Microsoft Lync Server 2010 Monitor/Archiving Server.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:CDR Service - 00 - DBCdr\CDR Service - 002 - Queue Latency CDR Service - 002 - Queue Latency (msec)
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The average time (in milliseconds) a request is held in the database queue.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:CDR Service - 00 - DBCdr\CDR Service - 004 - Sproc Latency CDR Service - 004 - Sproc Latency (msec)
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The average time (in milliseconds) it takes to execute a sproc call.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:CDR Service - 01 - READ CDR Service - 006 - Dropped messages from MQ
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LS:CDR Service - 01 - READ\CDR Service - 006 - Dropped messages from MQ

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LS:CDR Service - 01 - READ\CDR Service - 006 - Dropped messages from MQ
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LS:CDR Service - 01 - READ\CDR Service - 006 - Dropped messages from MQ

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LS:CDR Service - 01 - READ\CDR Service - 006 - Dropped messages from MQ
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LS:CDR Service - 01 - READ\CDR Service - 006 - Dropped messages from MQ

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Number of messages dropped from MSMQ queue.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:Arch Service - 01 - READ Arch Service - 002 - Messages that failed validation
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LS:Arch Service - 01 - READ\Arch Service - 002 - Messages that failed validation
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Number of messages that validation failed for.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LS:Arch Service - 01 - READ\Arch Service - 002 - Messages that failed validation
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LS:Arch Service - 01 - READ\Arch Service - 002 - Messages that failed validation

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LS:Arch Service - 01 - READ\Arch Service - 002 - Messages that failed validation
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LS:Arch Service - 01 - READ\Arch Service - 002 - Messages that failed validation

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:Arch Service - 01 - READ Arch Service - 006 - Dropped messages from MQ
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LS:Arch Service - 01 - READ\Arch Service - 006 - Dropped messages from MQ
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Number of messages dropped from MSMQ queue.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LS:Arch Service - 01 - READ\Arch Service - 006 - Dropped messages from MQ
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LS:Arch Service - 01 - READ\Arch Service - 006 - Dropped messages from MQ

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LS:Arch Service - 01 - READ\Arch Service - 006 - Dropped messages from MQ

ANALYSIS.NAME: LS:Arch Service - 02 - WRITE Arch Service - 002 - Messages failed to be written to DB
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LS:Arch Service - 02 - WRITE\Arch Service - 002 - Messages failed to be written to DB

DATASOURCE.NAME: \LS:Arch Service - 02 - WRITE\Arch Service - 002 - Messages failed to be written to DB
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \LS:Arch Service - 02 - WRITE\Arch Service - 002 - Messages failed to be written to DB

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \LS:Arch Service - 02 - WRITE\Arch Service - 002 - Messages failed to be written to DB
CHART.DATASOURCE: \LS:Arch Service - 02 - WRITE\Arch Service - 002 - Messages failed to be written to DB

THRESHOLD.NAME: Messages failed to be written to DB >= 500

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Number of messages failed to be written to SQL database.
